name: Space Invaders (itch) (Zoe Rowbotham)
description:
A simple Space Invaders clone made as part of my Games Technology degree.

Move the player ship with A and D, try to shoot all the aliens (with Space) and dodge their attacks. 

There are 4 modes to determine the movement of the alien ships: normal, gravity, quadratic and sine. These options simply move the aliens in different ways.
